description: The function unique_name_513 is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly uses user input (stringId, subs) to construct a string that is then used to retrieve a message. If an attacker can control the value of stringId or subs, they could inject malicious scripts that would be executed in the context of the user's session. This could lead to a variety of attacks, such as stealing the user's session token or performing actions on their behalf.
